(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ glad)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (NNP SCS) (NNP Butter))
            (VP (VBD recommended)
              (NP (DT this) (NNP Curry) (NNP Rice) (NN stall))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (PRP me))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(glad-4, I-1)
cop(glad-4, am-2)
advmod(glad-4, so-3)
root(ROOT-0, glad-4)
mark(recommended-8, that-5)
nn(Butter-7, SCS-6)
nsubj(recommended-8, Butter-7)
ccomp(glad-4, recommended-8)
det(stall-12, this-9)
nn(stall-12, Curry-10)
nn(stall-12, Rice-11)
dobj(recommended-8, stall-12)
prep(recommended-8, to-13)
pobj(to-13, me-14)

    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP eat)

          (NP (DT an) (JJ economic) (NN rice) (NN stall))))
      (, ,))))

(ROOT
  (SQ (CC or)
    (VBZ is)
    (NP (PRP it))
    (SBAR (IN that)
      (S
        (NP (PRP we))
        (ADVP (RB simply))
        (VP (VBP prefer)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB stick)
                (PP (IN with)
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WP what))
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP we))
                      (VP (VBP know) (RB rather)
                        (ADVP (RB then))
                        (VP (VB venture)
                          (PP (IN into)
                            (NP (JJ untested) (NN territory))))))))))))))
    (. ?)))

root(ROOT-0, is-2)
nsubj(is-2, it-3)
mark(prefer-7, that-4)
nsubj(prefer-7, we-5)
advmod(prefer-7, simply-6)
dep(is-2, prefer-7)
aux(stick-9, to-8)
xcomp(prefer-7, stick-9)
prep(stick-9, with-10)
dobj(know-13, what-11)
nsubj(know-13, we-12)
pcomp(with-10, know-13)
advmod(know-13, rather-14)
advmod(know-13, then-15)
dep(know-13, venture-16)
prep(venture-16, into-17)
amod(territory-19, untested-18)
pobj(into-17, territory-19)

    (PP (IN Anyway))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (RB so) (JJ enamored)
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (DT this) (JJ particular) (NNP Curry) (NNP Rice) (NN stall))))
      (SBAR (IN because)
        (S
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ their) (NN selection))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNS dishes))))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (ADJP
                (NP (DT a) (RB little))
                (JJ different)
                (PP (IN from)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN rest))))))
          (CC and)
          (S
            (NP (RB almost) (DT every) (NN dish))
            (ADVP (RB here))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADVP (RB really))
              (NP (NN shiok)))))))
    (. !)))

cop(enamored-4, am-2)
advmod(enamored-4, so-3)
root(ROOT-0, enamored-4)
prep(enamored-4, with-5)
det(stall-10, this-6)
amod(stall-10, particular-7)
nn(stall-10, Curry-8)
nn(stall-10, Rice-9)
pobj(with-5, stall-10)
mark(different-19, because-11)
poss(selection-13, their-12)
nsubj(different-19, selection-13)
prep(selection-13, of-14)
pobj(of-14, dishes-15)
cop(different-19, are-16)
det(little-18, a-17)
npadvmod(different-19, little-18)
advcl(enamored-4, different-19)
prep(different-19, from-20)
det(rest-22, the-21)
pobj(from-20, rest-22)
cc(different-19, and-23)
advmod(dish-26, almost-24)
det(dish-26, every-25)
nsubj(shiok-30, dish-26)
advmod(shiok-30, here-27)

  (SBAR (IN if)
    (S
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VB arrange)
          (NP
            (NP
              (QP (RB just) (DT a) (NN bit)))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP
                (NP (DT each) (NN dish))
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ single) (NN plate))))))))
      (CC and)
      (S
        (VP (VBG decorated)
          (NP (PRP it))
          (ADVP (RB nicely)))
        (, ,)))))

              (ADJP (RB wide) (JJ open)))))))

        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S

              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (PRP yourself))))))))
    (. .)))

                  (NP (PRP they))

                        (NP (DT this))

    (NP

                (NP (CD one))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NN texture))
      (VP (VBD was)
        (NP (`` ``)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP melt))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (NN mouth))))
          ('' '')
          (ADJP (JJ perfect)))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (`` ``) (NNP Kiam) (NNP Pang) ('' '') (NN flavor))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Pork))))
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB really))
        (VBZ lingers)
        (PP (IN at)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN back))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (NN tongue)))))
        (SBAR (IN after)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VB swallow)
              (NP (DT the)
                (ADJP (JJ tasty))
                (NN morsel)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD 'll)
      (VP (VB be)
        (UCP
          (S
            (VP (VB back)
              (ADVP (RB again)
                (CC and)
                (RB again))))
          (CC and)
          (ADVP (RB again)))))
    (. !)))
